m_szDocTitle: Local Motors to Deliver First 3D Printed Electric Vehicle in September  | Inside 3D Printing
m_szDocSumamry: Local Motors to Deliver First 3D Printed Electric Vehicle in September Published by Sandra Helsel , February 26, 2014 11:50 am (Venture Beat) Local Motors announced that the Association For Manufacturing Technology will be the first customer for its previously announced 3D printed production vehicle. Local Motors will build and deliver the first direct digital manufactured vehicle at  The International Manufacturing Technology Show in Chicago, September 8-13.
